title: NIT Agartala UG & Dual Degree Admission Notice 2025

instructions: Register using JEE (Main) 2025 Application number before physical reporting.
Fill in all required details.
Upload documents as specified in Table-1 in a single PDF if multiple.
documents: Admit card of class 10th / Birth certificate for age proof (mandatory)
Provisional Admission Letter issued by JoSAA/CSAB 2025 and final Seat acceptance letter (mandatory)
Photo ID proof as per Govt. of India guidelines (mandatory)
Caste validity Certificate for Maharashtra candidates
ST certificate for Tamil Nadu candidates issued by Revenue Divisional Officer
Migration and Conduct/Character certificate from last institution (mandatory)
Physical Disability Certificate as per JOSAA format, if applicable
Annual Family Income Certificate and affidavit for tuition fee remission (for B.Tech, if applicable)
Medical Certificate as per JOSAA format
GAP certificate if 12th passing year is not current year
additional_instructions: Make a single file of all original documents in the same sequence.
Bring a set of self-attested photocopies in the same sequence.

requirements: Bring originals and photocopies of documents from Table-1.
notes: Check Institute website for 1st semester fees and pay as applicable.
Tuition fee waiver eligibility must be verified; balance fees payable if not eligible.
No extension for physical reporting date.
Induction Programme schedule to be notified later.

instructions: Hostel payment and allotment process will be on the website.
Contact Chief Warden at chiefwardennita@gmail.com for queries.

refund_policy: Withdrawal after last date: only academic caution money refundable.
Canceling admission anytime during program: all semester fees forfeited, only academic caution money refundable.
Cancellation requires No-Dues certificate from MIS account.

A.title: Undertaking by all candidates
A.content: Candidate and parent undertake to abide by rules; provide correct documents; fees responsibility if false claim; provisional registration subject to document verification.

ParentDeclaration.content: Parent undertakes that student will follow rules, attend classes, maintain academic standards, and meet expenses.

instructions: Upload Annual Family Income Certificate and affidavit via MIS portal.
Certificate to be issued on or after 01/04/2025 for Financial Year 2024-25.
Supporting documents include Form-16, ITR, Pension Certificate.
ST, SC, PwD and students with annual family income above INR 5 lakhs are exempt from submission.

II.title: Income Affidavit
instructions: Submitted on non-judicial stamp paper Rs. 50/-
Sworn before First Class Magistrate/Notary Public
Details of family income for tuition fee remission
Declaration of truthfulness with penalties for false information

states.authority: SDM of Govt of NCT of Delhi
Sub Divisional Officer in each District
Deputy Collectors in Agatti and Minicoy and SDOs in remaining islands
District Authorities i.c. DC/ADC/SDO (not below rank of SDO/SDM)
Employer in case of Govt employee, MP/MLA/DC/SDO Civil in other cases
Dy. Commissioners, Addl. Dy. Commissioners, Sub-Divisional Officers (C)
Special Executive Magistrate (BDO, Rural Management & Development Dept.)
District Magistrate & Collector and SDM, DCM, DC (Competent Authority)
District Magistrate, Sub-Divisional Officer, Block Development Officer, Collector Kolkata depending on region
Not below the rank of Tahsildar/Competent Authority as per Govt Notification

StudyGapAffidavit.title: Affidavit of Study Gap
instructions: Submitted on Non-Judicial Stamp Paper of minimum Rs. 20/-
Declaration of 12th passing year and gap period
Activities during gap period
No criminal involvement
Verification clause

IV.title: Anti-Ragging
instructions: Submit anti-ragging affidavit and guardian declaration within 7 days from 28th August 2025
Online submission via www.antiragging.in
Download and sign affidavits, submit to NIT Agartala

issued_by: Prof. V N Saha, Dean (Academic), NIT Agartala
